game.name: Alchemist: Journey of the Soul
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: First-person adventure game, playable solo or co-op with up to 4 players. Use your magical abilities to solve puzzles or navigate through areas! Explore, use items, brew potions and unlock your full alchemical potential. Are you willing to do what it takes to claim a soul of your own?
game.shortDescriptionEn: First-person adventure game, playable solo or co-op with up to 4 players. Use your magical abilities to solve puzzles or navigate through areas! Explore, use items, brew potions and unlock your full alchemical potential. Are you willing to do what it takes to claim a soul of your own?
